= Introduction =
Short guide for installing the project and develop.


= Details =

  # Install Maven:
    * Windows:
      # Download the last version of Maven2 .zip from [http://maven.apache.org/download.html#Maven_2.2.1 Maven_2.2.1].
      # Unzip it in the location where you want to have it installed.
      # Modify the path by adding the location of the bin directory located inside the unzipped folder.
      # Test Maven2 runs correctly by writing {{{mvn}}} in the console.
    * Ubuntu:
        Go to Synaptics Package Manager and install _Maven2_.
  # Install Eclipse and proper plugins
    # Download and install Eclipse Classic: [http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/ Eclipse]
    # Set in .ini file in eclipse folder, the launching option
{{{
-vm
C:/...path_to_java_jdk.../bin
}}}
    # Install *Subclipse_1.4* plugin: [http://subclipse.tigris.org/ Subclipse_1.4]
    # Install *m2eclipse* plugin: [http://m2eclipse.sonatype.org/installing-m2eclipse.html m2eclipse]
  # Download this project from svn.
  # Run {{{Installer.java}}} class located in {{{installer}}} package. _Note: Maybe it's needed to comment all dependencies in 'pom.xml' file to allow compiling._
